item.title: Sinkhole entrance to the Pantiles cul de sac, 6th October
item.description:
The sinkhole has been here in excess of 3 weeks, plastic barriers have been erected around but have been continuously blown down and around in recent days with weather conditions It is causing congestion to enter and exit the road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Pantiles, Bickley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: V large Advertising poster dumped on road, 6th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Halstow Road, East Greenwich, London

item.title: Cargo shop taking up the whole pathway of Peckham Park Road, 6th October
item.description:
Please can you speak to this shop and tell them that they can't use this public pathway to store their cargo. It makes it very hard to walk down, especially with a wheelchair.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Peckham Park Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Streetlight not working (no on the (streetlight no. E50 ), 6th October
item.description:
This streetlight hasn't been working for several weeks. The streetlight is located along the busy North Circular Road. The pavement is used by both pedestrians and cyclists/people on e-scooters. The lack of light in the evening creates a real danger for all road users.The lamp is located next to the building Brook Lodge

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North Circular Road, Brent Cross, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poor road markings, yellow lines and stop sign, 6th October
item.description:
On 30th September there was a car crash on the junction of sewyln crescent/ danson crescent, a women was injured because there was no stop sign and poor white give way markings. This is the second crash in under 3 years. This happened so close to the schools coming out so it could of been alot worse. The yellow lines are really bad to so people park everywhere.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Selwyn Crescent, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The street lamp outside 127a Upton Rd has been off for over a week., 6th October
item.description:
The light is not working.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Upton Road, Blendon, London
